about_the_game:
Many people remember launching the Unfolding Engine and being greeted with a wide sweeping vivid soundtrack. Bringing together old retro sounds and vivid synthesised landscapes. The soundtrack conveys the sense of adventure and wonder of creating your own worlds. As well as a celebration of the timelessness of the 90s video game music era.

Music artist BARCHboi, as well as creating the engine - created a lush soundscape to communicate the fantastic nature of the engine. Using sounds from old sound cards such as the Yamaha XG and the MT32, as well as synthesisers from Fm synths and the Commodore 64. Helped gave the nature of the music a timeless video game feel from an era a time ago.

The tracks are sure to give those who admire retro video game tracks an absolute delight. As well as more tracks to come.

Contains 25 tracks, in 320kbt MP3 format, including an unreleased album of tracks never before heard by the public.

Tracks including the theme song of the Unfolding Engine.

  • 1 Welcome to Unfolding
  • 2 Nympths Port
  • 3 Chilled Water
  • 4 Anime
  • 5 Capt Beards Message
  • 6 Contimplator
  • 7 Demoscene Core 64k
  • 8 Dooms Day Fiend
  • 9 Dooms Day Prophet
  • 10 Groove Machine
  • 11 Heros Jouney
  • 12 Last Hope
  • 13 Main Menu Theme
  • 14 Metalic Friend
  • 15 My Best Friend
  • 16 Perfect Night
  • 17 Pop Gang
  • 18 Preparing For War
  • 19 Race Of the Fittest
  • 20 Showdown 2
  • 21 Showdown 2
  • 22 Shuffle Monsters
  • 23 Tempory Drone
  • 24 The Night Boat
  • 25 The Night Train

INSTALLATION: Once the Tracks are installed they will download to the Unfolding Engines steam app folder under UnfoldingEngineOST
